title: A $49.5 Million Neoclassical Home Gets Decked Out in Neon
text:
A Los Angeles estate a few doors down from the Playboy Mansion is listing for $49.5 million—the latest in a long line of ultra high-end properties to go on the market.

To attract attention, the home’s real-estate agents recently threw a massive bash at the property, featuring large-scale neon art installations by Olivia Steele. The home was lit up in neon, with massive lighted crystals placed throughout. There were 17 installations in all, including an over 16-foot-long fire art installation spelling out the phrase “I Wish...
description: A few doors down from the Playboy Mansion, this newly built Los Angeles property uses neon art installations to attract attention in a crowded market.
